title: 10GameChatRestriction For This?!

replies.body:
> cutiemichh: Muted...........

gotta follow through with it bro

Singling people out to make them feel ganged up on is not okay. It doesn't matter if they deserve it, don't ever lobby in chat for everyone to "9x" someone.

Not to mention the fact that it's not even necessary to do so because the review system only uses reports to decide whether or not to review. If there's more than zero reports, then it chooses to review the game. The reports don't factor into how heavily they are punished, nor do they affect how likely it is for the person to be punished.

so u can int all u want but if you feel ganged up on when your team is irritated is more toxic.

poor intentional feeders :( they have it so rough

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/173/576/Wat8.jpg

Dude use your brain organ, not your satire organ.

All forms of toxicity are not acceptable. Being detected differently is not the same thing as being okay to do.

Engaging in an argument throughout an entire game is dustracting, and terrible for morale. Doesn’t really matter what the reasoning is, you just can’t do that. 

Did you report the Cait?

Or if they're under review.

and you're somehow more positive than him, LOL.

accusing someone of inting when they probably were, but since you dont know shit about how the game went you can assume the "positivity" side to somehow make yourself feel like trolls arent running rampant as we speak is somehow bannable.\
